DOC.brief_summary: Despite the effectiveness of beta-blockers and antiplatelet agents for secondary prevention of coronary heart disease, this treatments are underused in the elderly because of diagnosis uncertainty and underuse of efficient treatment. in a first time, diagnosis reassessment with invasive technique if necessary. in a second time, treatment reassessment.
DOC.brief_title: Reassessment Strategy in the Diagnosis of Coronary Heart Disease in Elderly
DOC.criteria: patients 75 of age or older hospitalized in a geriatric service and suspect of coronary heart disease acute myocardial infarction
